careInstructions.description:
- Machine Wash Cold
- Tumble Dry Low
- Do Not Bleach
- Do Not Iron
- Do Not Dry Clean

fabric.description: Our performance knit fabric designed to keep you cool, dry, and Doing Things. CoolTech is lightweight, breathable, and stretchy with a sweat-wicking finish.
fabric.title: CoolTech

pdp.subtitle: Breathable, sweat-wicking, and designed to dry quick. With a classic fit and a cool-to-the-touch feel, consider this performance knit polo the one to beat.

productKnowledges.title: Description
productKnowledges.description: Breathable, sweat-wicking, and designed to dry quick. With a classic fit and a cool-to-the-touch feel, consider this performance knit polo the one to beat.

productKnowledges.title: Ideal For
productKnowledges.description: Medium to high-sweat Recreation — think golfing, court sports, and everyday wear.
